fig.title: XDITA example
fig.p: The following example demonstrates the use of an unordered list in an XDITA topic.
fig.pre:
What we offer

  • "Know-how" license

  • Warranty of exclusive territory

  • Initial training

  • Support through online, email, and telephone channels

fig.title: MDITA example
